import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../Assets/Logo2.png' import cart_icon from '../Assets/cart-icon.jpg' const Navbar = () => { const [menu,setMenu] = useState("shop") return (

Shopper

  • {setMenu("shop")}}>Shop {menu === "shop"?
    : <>}
  • {setMenu("toys")}}>Toys
  • {setMenu("kitchenware")}}>Kitchenware
  • {setMenu("stationery")}}>Stationery
0
) } export default Navbar
